detailsOfAchievement: Created classrooms with 8 computer systems and a library having 24 by 7 power backup where more than 200 children are getting benefitted out of that. We have prepared home-based nursery where we have grown more than 1000 plants to be planted in a year. We use plastic milk packets which becomes waste after use in functions to germinate seeds hence preventing these non-degradable packets to be dumped into ponds and public places.

detailsOfAchievement: our organisation actively involved in social and educational awareness programme amongst weaker section of the society in particular dalit and minority community. for this we organise various health camp for free medical check up apart from this we distributed cloths and educational kits for poor children.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: To uplift the living conditions of the scheduled caste and scheduled tribe communities in the village.
Various initiatives were taken for the improvement and development of the agricultural production in the area.
To uplift the minority sections in the region and alleviate their grievances various measures were taken.
A seminar named "Bihar mein Urdu Bahaisiyat-e-Dusri Sarkari Zaban: Masael aur Imkanaat" was held for the promotion of urdu language in the region.
